title: Fox sets Disney deal vote for July 10
text:
May 30, 2018 / 12:35 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago Fox sets Disney deal vote for July 10 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Reuters) - Twenty-First Century Fox Inc ( FOXA.O ) will hold a special meeting on July 10th for its stockholders to vote on a proposed merger with Walt Disney Co ( DIS.N ), the company said on Wednesday. FILE PHOTO: The 21st Century Fox logo is displayed on the side of a building in midtown Manhattan in New York, U.S., February 27, 2018. REUTERS/Lucas Jackson
The Fox board also recommended backing the deal but said that it was aware of Comcast Corp’s ( CMCSA.O ) moves to make an offer for the company.
Comcast said last week it was preparing a higher, all-cash offer for most of the media assets of Fox, but sources say it will only proceed if a federal judge next month allows AT&T Inc’s ( T.N ) planned $85-billion (64 billion pounds) acquisition of Time Warner Inc ( TWX.N ). Reporting by Sonam Rai in Bengaluru; editing by Patrick Graham
